answers.answer: It's not a big deal :) you just check your blood a few times a day and change your diet. They may monitor your baby more to make sure he or she doesn't get too big.

My one hour glucose test came back high but I ended up passing the three hour...with the 3 hour test I only failed the one hour blood draw but I passed the two and three hour..you'll be fine Tho just eat healthy

question: I am due July 10th my second child. I was told my glucose test came back high. I now have to go to the hospital for the glucose three hour tolerence test.  A bit worried, I am hoping it comes back negative so I don't have to worry about having gestational diabetes.  Any advice if it does come back positive?
title: gestational diabetes
